content: work in between the half-double_crochet stitches 8 continue through the middle hiding the long tail 4 times total 9 tie a knot on the end of the long tail to secure and cut any excess yarn 10 enjoy your gourdgeous mini gourdgeousknits com - instagram @gourdgeousknits - facebook com/gourdgeousknits 3 contact please email me at gourdgeousknits@gmail com if you have any questions about the pattern feel free to send and tag me in any photos of your works in progress and finished projects with #gourdgeousminis and #gourdgeousknits i love seeing your knits and sharing them on my social media sites instagram @gourdgeousknits facebook www facebook com/gourdgeousknits ravelry gourdgeousknits etsy gourdgeousknits etsy com lovecrafts gourdgeous knits pinterest gourdgeous knits youtube gourdgeous knits the patterns and photographs are the property of kristin strecker-kellogg of gourdgeous knits and are for personal non- commercial use the selling or distribution of these patterns physically or electronically are not permitted please credit gourdgeous knits when sharing on social media with #gourdgeousknits © gourdgeous knits 2023 gourdgeousknits com - instagram @gourdgeousknits - facebook com/gourdgeousknits 4
